com.pixolus.meterreading

Interface MeterReadingViewListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CameraViewListener

    public interface MeterReadingViewListener
extends CameraViewListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive meter reading results from a MeterReadingView.

    The MeterReadingView reports reading results and state changes by invoking callbacks on the Activity that is was instantiated from. This interface holds all callbacks that you need to implement in your activity to perform meter reading.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFirstDetection(MeterReadingView meterReadingView)
      This callback is invoked by the MeterReadingView after the first detection of a meter.
      void onScanReadings(MeterReadingView meterReadingView, List<MeterReadingResult> results, Bitmap image, Metadata metadata)

    • Method Detail

      • onScanReadings

        void onScanReadings(MeterReadingView meterReadingView,
                    List<MeterReadingResult> results,
                    Bitmap image,
                    Metadata metadata)
        This callback is invoked by a MeterReadingView whenever a meter could be read, a timeout occured, or a user-initiated manual capture is performed.

        You can inspect the metadata parameter to get the reason for this capture event.

        The length of the list provided in the results parameter is equal to the number of counters as configured via MeterReadingView.setNumberOfCounters(int), independent of whether all counters could be read or not (e.g. when a timeout occured or the user initiated a manual capture). You should inspect the individual elements of the results to determine whether a counter could actually be read or not (using the MeterReadingResult.status() method).

        Parameters:
        meterReadingView - The View that originated the call.
        results - The list of actual results (i.e. metering values).
        image - The bitmap image on which the results were scanned.
        metadata - Additional information about the reading.

      • onFirstDetection

        void onFirstDetection(MeterReadingView meterReadingView)
        This callback is invoked by the MeterReadingView after the first detection of a meter.

        It does not indicate whether the meter could be read or not, only that a first detection has occured. If the counters on the meter could actually be read successfully, the MeterReadingView issues a call to onScanReadings(MeterReadingView, List, Bitmap, Metadata) immediately afterwards.

        Parameters:
        meterReadingView - The View that originated the call.
